answers.answer: Assuming you are under the care of an Eye MD ophthalmologist you are headed in the right direction. You may need other tests including a carotid doppler, ECHO cardiogram and blood work to rule out temporal arteritis, high cholesterol, diabetes. If you smoke, are obese consider this a wake up call and stop smoking, lose weight, exercise and keep you blood pressure and cholesterol under good control.JCH MD

question: I woke up Monday and my could not see anything out of my right eye. I've been to the eye dr and today a neuro who did and MRI/MRA and found nothing. Prior to Monday ( Friday/Sat) I had a major eye ache. Does anyone really have answer. I know I am not crazy.This discussion is related to/posts/show/607384.
title: I had the same thing happen to me
